alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN SAN MIGUEL COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM MDT... At 427 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Conchas Dam, or 28 miles southwest of Mosquero, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conchas Dam, Conchas Lake State Park and Bell Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
